alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Covington; Forrest; Franklin; Jasper; Jefferson Davis; Jones; Lamar; Lawrence; Lincoln; Marion; Simpson; Smith (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 08 at 4:52AM CST until January 09 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of central, east central, south central, southeast, and southwest Mississippi, including the following areas, in central Mississippi, Simpson and Smith. In east central Mississippi, Clarke and Jasper. In south central Mississippi, Jefferson Davis, Lawrence, Lincoln and Marion. In southeast Mississippi, Covington, Forrest, Jones and Lamar. In southwest Mississippi, Franklin MS. * WHEN...From this evening through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Storm drains and ditches may become clogged with debris. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Three to six inches of rain with locally higher amounts may fall in a short period of time as thunderstorms move repeatedly across the area Monday night. This would likely lead to flash flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Clarke; Covington; Forrest; Franklin; Jasper; Jefferson Davis; Jones; Lamar; Lawrence; Lincoln; Marion; Simpson; Smith
